product_name: SmartWool Outdoor Sport Light Crew Socks - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for a casual day hike, the women's SmartWool Outdoor Sport Light Crew Socks provide protection just above your boot tops and keep your feet comfortable with their merino wool blend. Made from soft merino wool blended with nylon and elastane, these socks wick moisture away from your feet, keeping them dry and cool in summer and warm in winter. 4-Degree Fit System for all-day performance fit. Reinforced heels and toes for durability. Strategic mesh ventilation zones. Flat-knit toe seams reduce bulk. Closeout.
short_description: Perfect for a casual day hike, the women's SmartWool Outdoor Sport Light Crew Socks provide protection just above your boot tops and keep your feet comfortable with their merino wool blend.
